title: GPT-5争议、开源追赶、能力飞跃：Epoch AI年终报告揭示AI能力加速提升
description: 12月25日，专注于人工智能基准测试的非营利组织Epoch AI发布的年终报告显示，总体而言，人工智能模型的能力正在快速提升。
titleZh: GPT-5争议、开源追赶、能力飞跃：Epoch AI年终报告揭示AI能力加速提升
titleEn: GPT-5 Controversy, Open-Source Catching Up, Capabilities Leap: Epoch AI Year-End Report Reveals Accelerating AI Capabilities
descriptionZh: 12月25日，专注于人工智能基准测试的非营利组织Epoch AI发布的年终报告显示，总体而言，人工智能模型的能力正在快速提升。
descriptionEn: On December 25th, the year-end report released by the non-profit organization Epoch AI, which focuses on AI benchmarking, indicates that overall, the capabilities of AI models are rapidly improving.

title: NVIDIA豪掷2000亿美元，谷歌TPU之父连夜赶赴黄仁勋加盟
description: 平安夜，AI芯片领域传出惊人消息！
titleZh: NVIDIA豪掷2000亿美元，谷歌TPU之父连夜赶赴黄仁勋加盟
titleEn: NVIDIA Splurges $200 Billion, Father of Google TPU Rushes to Join Jensen Huang Overnight
descriptionZh: 平安夜，AI芯片领域传出惊人消息！
descriptionEn: On Christmas Eve, shocking news broke in the AI chip field! "The world's most valuable company," NVIDIA, has licensed inference technology from AI startup Groq, with rumors of a $200 billion "acquisition" of the father of Google TPU and his engineering team. This move by Jensen Huang targets AI inference, directly challenging Google TPU.

title: 刚刚，高中辍学创办的AI公司被英伟达1400亿“收购”

titleEn: Just Now, the AI Company Founded by a High School Dropout Was "Acquired" by NVIDIA for 140 Billion
descriptionZh: 在一个地方假装行动，而在别处进行真正的行动。
descriptionEn: Feign action in one place while making the real move elsewhere.
